author: Jahdai Cintron

changelog.release_notes:
- Fixed bug in original pebble that crashed app when opening a list
- Fixed missing task background
- Performance improvements
- Began updating code for Diorite platform

- Added color
- Added support for Pebble Time Round
- Fixed text encoding issue
- New settings page (you may need to sign in again)
- Change Wunderlist accounts
- New website with FAQ
- Redesigned settings page

* You may experience a bug with Pebble.js - https://github.com/pebble/pebblejs/issues/161
* Pebble Time Round features are still experimental since testing is hard for me because I don't own one and the emulator is still new.

- Added color
- Added support for Pebble Time Round
- Fixed text encoding issue
- New settings page (you may need to sign in again)
- Change Wunderlist accounts
- New website with FAQ
- Redesigned settings page

* You may experience a bug with Pebble.js - https://github.com/pebble/pebblejs/issues/161

* Pebble Time Round features are still experimental since testing is hard for me because I don't own one and the emulator is still new.

- Added Support for new Wunderlist Folders
- New Icons to Match Wunderlist's New Look

- Improved speed and efficiency
- Shared Lists are Correctly Detected
- Added Today Smart List
- Added Week Smart List
- Improved Error Handling

See more information on the new release at http://jahdaicintron.com/wunderpebble
- WunderPebble is now using the official Wunderlist API!
- Longpress on a task to mark it complete (And again to mark incomplete)
- Lists and tasks should appear in the correct order.
- Users concerned with privacy can rest easy. WunderPebble now uses Wunderlist's OAuth2 authentication to log in.

- Group Lists Now Have a Group Icon

- Fixed Timezone Problem Affecting Certain People That Couldn't See Tasks
  (thanks to everyone that helped me debug)

- Corrected Week View and Separated It By Day

- Separated Today View By List Name

- More Detailed Error Logging

- Reduced Size of Resources

- Added Anonymous Opt-In Error Reporting

- Tells You When a List is Empty Instead of Giving a Blank Screen

- Added some loading screens so you know what the app is up to.

- Fixed an issue with empty due dates crashing the app when fetching lists.

- Changed Week View to show which list each task belongs to.
First release. Let's you view lists, tasks and notes. More features coming soon. All suggestions are welcome.

description:
An elegant and feature-filled Wunderlist client for your Pebble. View Lists and mark Tasks complete right on your wrist.

I'm constantly adding new features. Visit my site and send me suggestions or donate to help.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Fixed bug in original pebble that crashed app when opening a list
- Fixed missing task background
- Performance improvements
- Began updating code for Diorite platform

title: WunderPebble
